attributes.action: Subsidise or cap the cost of products in motorway services
attributes.background: I'm a lorry driving who has to sleep or stop for breaks in motorway services and the cost of products is shocking. I know from my previous employment that coach drivers have the same problem too

rejection.details:
This is the responsibility of retailers at service stations, not the Government or Parliament.

You could start a new petition asking Parliament to change the law, to require employers of HGV and other drivers to pay allowances for food and drink consumed during legally-required rest stops.
